headline: Insurers Team Up to Create Lower-Cost Generic Drugs
abstract: The Blue Cross Blue Shield Association and others say they have agreed to invest in a nonprofit’s effort to develop and sell cheaper drugs.
lead_paragraph: A major group of insurers said it would invest $55 million to create cheaper versions of expensive generic drugs for which there is little competition, in a further sign of dissatisfaction with the pharmaceutical industry’s price-setting practices.
keywords: Blue Cross and Blue Shield Assn
